title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Online Collaboration-Based Teacher Professional Development in Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can share science education designs with peer teachers in ≥3 collaborative stages using the ILDE platform
Learners can finalize a science education scenario integrating ICT tools after incorporating peer feedback
Participants can analyze ≥2 conflict cases from online collaboration and propose strategies to improve collaboration
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
